column2: *Data presented in Bact Facts Interactive may differ from other ABCs publications since different datasets or methods may be used. **Small numbers for some topics or filters may make year to year changes difficult to interpret. ***Since each infection may have unique characteristics, the information available to display differs by individual bacterium. ****Final 2020 Data Revision - A revision was made to the 2020 ABCs data for group B Streptococcus to update the final case counts and rates. The original released data were publicly available from November 23, 2022 â€“ September 20, 2023; the revised data were released September 20, 2023.
The license for this dataset is unspecified
